name: Hiveswap Fansim - Volume ???: Of Texts Gray And Signs Hidden
name_original: Hiveswap Fansim - Volume ???: Of Texts Gray And Signs Hidden
description:
Missing Friendsim? Does the absence of releases every other Friday with brand new friends to meet leave a hole in your heart? Look no further - Hiveswap Fansim: Volume ??? is here! Two mysterious new trolls to meet, two fully written routes to play, and two more friends to add to your collection.

Art and Coding by @noisyrobo on Twitter

Writing and Music by @Schgain on Twitter

Hiveswap and Hiveswap Friendsim are owned by What Pumpkin and we claim no ownership of the core game or assets used from the core game.
